Title: Branded to Kill
Writer: Hachiro Guryu (screenplay), Hachiro Guryu, Takeo Kimura (screenplay), Chûsei Sone (screenplay), Atsushi Yamatoya (screenplay)
Actors: Jô Shishido, Mariko Ogawa, Annu Mari, Kôji Nanbara
Plot: The number-three-ranked hit-man, with a fetish for sniffing boiling rice, fumbles his latest job, which puts him into conflict with a mysterious woman whose death wish inspires her to surround herself with dead butterflies and dead birds. Worse danger comes from his own treacherous wife and finally with the number-one-ranked hit-man, known only as a phantom to those who fear his unseen presence.
